```{r}
#raw datasets

casesanddeaths = read.csv(file = "csvs/us-counties.csv")
data_health = read.csv(file = "csvs/us-county-health-rankings-2020.csv")
data_mobility = read.csv(file = "csvs/us-mobility.csv")

data_mobility$county = stringr::str_remove(data_mobility$region, " County")

```

```{r}

CD_mobility = merge(x = casesanddeaths, y = data_mobility, all.x = TRUE, by = c("county", "state"))
```

```{r}

basiclm.0329 = lm(mobility_cov19.0329$cases ~ mobility_cov19.0329$retail_recreation + mobility_cov19.0329$grocery_pharmacy + mobility_cov19.0329$parks + mobility_cov19.0329$transit_stations + mobility_cov19.0329$workplaces + mobility_cov19.0329$residential, data = mobility_cov19.0329)
```

```{r}

datasubsets = list(mobility_cov19.0329,mobility_cov19.0330, mobility_cov19.0331, mobility_cov19.0401, mobility_cov19.0402, mobility_cov19.0403, mobility_cov19.0404, mobility_cov19.0405, mobility_cov19.0406, mobility_cov19.0407, mobility_cov19.0408, mobility_cov19.0409, mobility_cov19.0410, mobility_cov19.0411, mobility_cov19.0412, mobility_cov19.0413, mobility_cov19.0414, mobility_cov19.0415, mobility_cov19.0416, mobility_cov19.0417, mobility_cov19.0418, mobility_cov19.0419, mobility_cov19.0420, mobility_cov19.0421, mobility_cov19.0422, mobility_cov19.0423, mobility_cov19.0424)




for (daydata in datasubsets){
  lmtest_cases = lm(cases ~ retail_recreation + grocery_pharmacy + parks + transit_stations + workplaces + residential, data = daydata)
  lmtest_deaths = lm(deaths ~ retail_recreation + grocery_pharmacy + parks + transit_stations + workplaces + residential, data = daydata)
  
  summary(lmtest_cases)
  anova(lmtest_cases)
  summary(lmtest_deaths)
  anova(lmtest_deaths)


  
}
```
